checkbox.name: Developer Mode
checkbox.desc: Enables debug_tools.hx, allows for speeding up/slowing down the game. PRESS 2 - Slows Game By 10% (Min Speed: 10%) PRESS 3 - Resets Game Speed To 100% PRESS 4 - Speeds Game By 10% (Max Speed: 200%) PRESS 5 - Hold To Speed Game By 2000%, Uses BOTPLAY PRESS 6 - Hold For Botplay On Player Strums
